name: base44-marketing
description: Marketing intelligence system with 9 agents, 77+ tactics, 71 psychology principles, brand governance, and evolving memory. Features open-ended routing, GTM strategist for holistic planning, anti-TV-ad tone enforcement, channel-specific content (LinkedIn, X, Email, SEO), anti-AI patterns, hook creation rules, cross-platform repurposing, and automated landing page generation with CMS pipeline.
